languages.text: "Буду откровенен, Ваша Светлость. Неожиданная гибель Леди Теодоры стала ударом для всех нас, а отсутствие каких-либо достоверных и полных сведений о ее преемни{mf|ке|це} дает почву для всевозможных слухов и кривотолков — особенно если кто-то нарочно разжигает волнения и недовольство. Конечно, никто прямо не посмеет бросить вам вызов, обвинив в чем-то столь святотатственном, как убийство Вольного Торговца, однако... в свое время Кунрад Войгтвир принес немало благ протекторату — и потому к его словам могут прислушиваться".

traits.locale_text: "Буду откровенен, Ваше Благородие. Неожиданная гибель Леди Теодоры стала ударом для всех нас, а отсутствие каких-либо достоверных и полных сведений о ее преемни{mf|ке|це} дает почву для всевозможных слухов и кривотолков — особенно если кто-то нарочно разжигает волнения и недовольство. Конечно, никто прямо не посмеет бросить вам вызов, обвинив в чем-то столь святотатственном, как убийство Вольного Торговца, однако... в свое время Кунрад Войгтвир принес немало благ торговой империи — и потому к его словам могут прислушиваться".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."
languages.original_text: "Буду откровенен, Ваша Светлость. Неожиданная гибель Леди Теодоры стала ударом для всех нас, а отсутствие каких-либо достоверных и полных сведений о ее преемни{mf|ке|це} дает почву для всевозможных слухов и кривотолков — особенно если кто-то нарочно разжигает волнения и недовольство. Конечно, никто прямо не посмеет бросить вам вызов, обвинив в чем-то столь святотатственном, как убийство Вольного Торговца, однако... в свое время Кунрад Войгтвир принес немало благ протекторату — и потому к его словам могут прислушиваться".

traits.locale_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manners of rumors and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader, however... Kunrad Voigtvir used to be a true boon to the trade empire back in the day — and as such some might listen to his words."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “我可以坦率地告诉您，大人。西奥多拉夫人的突然离世，对我们所有人而言都是个重大打击。关于她的继任者，当时并没有可以核实的完整信息，于是各种谣言与误解便接踵而至，更何况当时还有人故意煽动动乱与不满。自然，没人会当面质疑您，指责您做出了谋杀行商浪人这种大逆不道的事情……不过，当年的昆拉德·维特威尔曾为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝立下过汗马功劳。因此，说不定真的有人会听信他的谣言。”
languages.original_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."

traits.locale_text: “我可以坦率地告诉您，大人。西奥多拉夫人的突然离世，对我们所有人而言都是个重大打击。关于她的继任者，当时并没有可以核实的完整信息，于是各种谣言与误解便接踵而至，更何况当时还有人故意煽动动乱与不满。自然，没人会当面质疑您，指责您做出了谋杀行商浪人这种大逆不道的事情……不过，当年的昆拉德·维特威尔曾为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝立下过汗马功劳。因此，说不定真的有人会听信他的谣言。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Le seré sincero, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La repentina muerte de lady Theodora ha sido un duro golpe para todos y la falta de cualquier información completa y verificable sobre su sucesor{mf||a} sirve de base a toda clase de rumores y falsas interpretaciones, especialmente cuando alguien incita al descontento y a la rebeldía. Naturalmente, no hay quien se atreva a acusarle de algo tan sacrílego como el asesinato de una Comerciante Independiente... pero en su día Kunrad Voigtvir fue un pilar del protectorado y, como tal, hay quienes podrían hacer caso a sus mentiras».
languages.original_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."

traits.locale_text: «Le seré sincero, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La repentina muerte de lady Theodora ha sido un duro golpe para todos y la falta de cualquier información completa y verificable sobre su sucesor{mf||a} sirve de base a toda clase de rumores y falsas interpretaciones, especialmente cuando alguien incita al descontento y a la rebeldía. Naturalmente, no hay quien se atreva a acusarle de algo tan sacrílego como el asesinato de una Comerciante Independiente... pero en su día Kunrad Voigtvir fue un pilar del protectorado y, como tal, hay quienes podrían hacer caso a sus mentiras».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「率直に申し上げます、陛下。レディ・テオドラの突然の死は我々全員に大きな衝撃を与えました。彼女の後継者について検証できる完全な情報がないため、さまざまな噂や誤解が生まれるのです――誰かが意図的に不安や不満を煽っていればなおさらのこと。もちろん、あなたが自由開拓者を暗殺したという不敬な意見を述べるものはおりませんが…クンラッド・ボイトヴィルはかつて、保護国家にとって実にに有益な存在であったため、彼の言葉に耳を傾ける者もいるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."

traits.locale_text: 「率直に申し上げます、陛下。レディ・テオドラの突然の死は我々全員に大きな衝撃を与えました。彼女の後継者について検証できる完全な情報がないため、さまざまな噂や誤解が生まれるのです――誰かが意図的に不安や不満を煽っていればなおさらのこと。もちろん、あなたが自由開拓者を暗殺したという不敬な意見を述べるものはおりませんが…クンラッド・ボイトヴィルはかつて、保護国家にとって実にに有益な存在であったため、彼の言葉に耳を傾ける者もいるかもしれません」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Ich will offen mit Euch sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Lady Theodoras plötzlicher Tod war ein Schlag für uns alle, und das Fehlen jeglicher überprüfbarer und umfassender Informationen über {mf|ihren Nachfolger|ihre Nachfolgerin} führte zu allen möglichen Gerüchten und Fehldeutungen – zumal wenn jemand absichtlich Unruhe und Unzufriedenheit schürt. Natürlich würde es niemand wagen, Euch eines derartigen Sakrilegs wie des Mordes an einer Freihändlerin zu beschuldigen ... Aber Kunrad Voigtvir war früher von großem Nutzen für das Protektorat – und einige vertrauen seinen Worten immer noch."
languages.original_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will offen mit Euch sein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Lady Theodoras plötzlicher Tod war ein Schlag für uns alle, und das Fehlen jeglicher überprüfbarer und umfassender Informationen über {mf|ihren Nachfolger|ihre Nachfolgerin} führte zu allen möglichen Gerüchten und Fehldeutungen – zumal wenn jemand absichtlich Unruhe und Unzufriedenheit schürt. Natürlich würde es niemand wagen, Euch eines derartigen Sakrilegs wie des Mordes an einer Freihändlerin zu beschuldigen ... Aber Kunrad Voigtvir war früher von großem Nutzen für das Protektorat – und einige vertrauen seinen Worten immer noch."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Pour être franc, Votre Seigneurie, la mort soudaine de dame Théodora nous a porté un coup dur. L'incertitude liée à la succession a laissé libre cours à toutes sortes de rumeurs, et certains en ont même profité pour provoquer des troubles. Naturellement, nul n'oserait vous accuser du sacrilège d'avoir assassiné une libre-marchande... Cela dit, il fut un temps où Kunrad Voigtvir était une figure importante du protectorat. En tant que tel, il y en a qui pourraient être tentés de lui prêter une oreille attentive. »
languages.original_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."

traits.locale_text: « Pour être franc, Votre Seigneurie, la mort soudaine de dame Théodora nous a porté un coup dur. L'incertitude liée à la succession a laissé libre cours à toutes sortes de rumeurs, et certains en ont même profité pour provoquer des troubles. Naturellement, nul n'oserait vous accuser du sacrilège d'avoir assassiné une libre-marchande... Cela dit, il fut un temps où Kunrad Voigtvir était une figure importante du protectorat. En tant que tel, il y en a qui pourraient être tentés de lui prêter une oreille attentive. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Sizinle açık konuşacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Leydi Theodora'nın ani ölümü hepimize darbe vurdu. Vârisine dair güvenilir ve bütünlüklü bir bilgi olmaması da türlü türlü söylentilere ve yanlış yorumlamalara sebep oluyor, özellikle de birisi kasıtlı olarak kargaşa ve memnuniyetsizlik tohumları ekme niyetindeyse. Elbette ki hiç kimse sizi bir Hür Tacir'i öldürmek gibi büyük bir günahla suçlamaya cüret edemez. Kunrad Voigtvir, bir zamanlar protektoranın en değer gören kişiliklerinden biriydi. Bu nedenle onun sözlerine kulak asacaklar çıkabilir."
languages.original_text: "I shall be frank with you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Lady Theodora's sudden death was a blow to every one of us, and the absence of any sort of verifiable and complete information about her successor gives grounds for all manner of rumours and misinterpretations — especially if someone is deliberately inciting unrest and discontent. Naturally, none would dare challenge you by accusing you of something as sacrilegious as murdering a Rogue Trader... However, Kunrad Voigtvir was once a true boon to the protectorate back in the day — and as such, some might heed his words."

traits.locale_text: "Sizinle açık konuşacağım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Leydi Theodora'nın ani ölümü hepimize darbe vurdu ve vârisiyle ilgili herhangi bir güvenilir ve bütünlüklü bilgiye sahip olmamak türlü türlü söylentilere ve yanlış yorumlamalara sebep oluyor, özellikle de birisi kasıtlı olarak kargaşa ve memnuniyetsizlik tohumları ekme niyetindeyse. Elbette ki hiç kimse sizi bir Hür Tacir'i öldürmek gibi büyük bir günahla suçlamaya cüret edemez ancak Kunrad Voigtvir bir zamanlar protektoranın en değer gören kişiliklerinden biriydi ve bu nedenle de onun sözlerine kulak asacaklar çıkabilir."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
